To MacGyverNL:
1. DS9 S6D3: Get it from Mininova. It's the same tracker, maybe it's copied from TPB.
2. DS9 S5D7: The same situation as you and many others: 98.1% (80 Megs) :(

To MacGyver:
You can try something else: Find DS9 torrent with all episodes in ratDVD format. If you have Azureus you can select wich file you want to dld, so you can dld only those two episodes. Then get ratDVD software (free) and convert those two files to DVDs. I tried with S5D7, it worked but I'm not satisfied about quality, sound AC3 2ch and only english subs
